1C4CFA0AD3125A6D.title: Oh god, what have I gotten myself into!?

display.title: What is this Mess?!
description: In its simplest form, Ore Processing in GregTech boils down to &&aconverting one Ore Block into two Ingots through two Dusts&&r, like several other tech mods.
The added spice is the amount of steps, either optional or required.
Ore Processing will be explained further once you get into &&7LV&&r.
&&6This quest unlocks a new tutorial on rudimentary Ore Processing in the &&lTips and Tricks&&r&&6 tab - check it out to learn more!&&r

subtitle.text: ...and how do I get rid of it?
